</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> A getter for [[setFog]]. Returns the current value of the fog in range 0...1. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''fog''' </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_foglevel = [[fog]];</code>

</value></part><part><name> mp </name>=<value> Pre-Arma 3, each client and the server could have different values. In Arma 3 the value is synced across network. </value></part><part><name/>=<value> Multiplayer

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[fogParams]], [[fogForecast]], [[setFog]], [[nextWeatherChange]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>
